import { Meta, Story, Props, Preview } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
import Icon from '..';

<Meta title="Components/Icon" />

<Story name="Import" />

# Icon

An icon is a glyph used to represent something else.

## Import

```jsx
import { Icon } from '@qnt/ui';
```

<Story name="Props" />

## Props

<Props of={Icon} />

## Usage

<Preview withToolbar>
  <Story name="Usage">
    <>
      <Icon icon="endorsed" color="#EE4037"/>
      <Icon icon="endorsed" size={32} color="#9c1e17"/>
      <Icon icon="endorsed" size={48} color="#31a968"/>
      <Icon icon="endorsed" size={32} color="#33333f"/>
      <Icon icon="endorsed"/>
    </>
  </Story>
</Preview>
